rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a robust reception area featuring raw concrete textures and minimalistic finishes. Floor-to-ceiling windows allow ample natural light.
Spacious living space with exposed brickwork and large windows for a vibrant connection to the outdoors. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the entrance facing east.
A multifunctional dining space that opens directly into the living room with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample daylight.
Modern kitchen integrated with a service corridor leading to servant's quarters located in the rear. The design includes robust Brutalist elements and energy-efficient ventilation.
Luxurious master suite with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, private bathroom, and built-in storage. The room is positioned to ensure privacy and Vastu compliance.
Cozy guest bedroom ensuring ample natural light with floor-to-ceiling windows. Adheres to local design norms.
Another guest room designed for comfort with large windows and minimalistic interior finishes.

openings.description: Provides natural illumination and a connection to the outdoors, adhering to both Brutalist aesthetics and Vastu principles.
Large glass doors that blend indoor spaces with the outdoor environment while maintaining privacy in selected areas.

rooms.description: A dedicated study area with built-in bookshelves and ample window space to ensure a peaceful work environment.
Additional bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and an adjoining private balcony for outdoor access.
An open space attached to Bedroom Suite 3 providing a relaxing outdoor area while maintaining the Brutalist design aesthetic.

openings.description: Enhances natural light and adheres to Vastu principles by aligning with the sun's path.
